title: Chamizal National Memorial: Parks as Classrooms
body: Parks as Classrooms        Field Trips Bring your students to Chamizal National Memorial for one of our field trip options. Choose a self-guided or ranger-led visit or attend one of our theater performances tailored to students.  All Field Trips     Guest Speakers Invite a Ranger to your Classroom. Students learn about the National Park Service, Chamizal National Memorial and a natural or cultural science topic. Reserve your ranger today! All Guest Speakers
